info.title: ThingSpace Software Management Services API (v3)
info.description: The ThingSpace Software Management Services API lets customers manage, schedule, and distribute software updates to eligible 4G and 5G Internet of Things (IoT) devices already deployed in the field. This allows devices-even those in inaccessible locations-to be upgraded easily, reducing the need for site visits and truck rolls.

tags.name: Campaigns V3
tags.description: Schedule, retrieve or cancel scheduled FOTA campaigns.

tags.name: Software Management Reports V3
tags.description: Status of a campaign per device.

tags.name: Firmware V3
tags.description: State of Firmware across devices in the account.

tags.name: Software Management Callbacks V3
tags.description: Find registered callbacks or create, update and delete a registered callback.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a FOTA subscription by account.
The endpoint allows user to list license usage.

post.description: This endpoint allows user to assign licenses to a list of devices.

deviceList.resultReason: Upgrade pending, the device upgrade is estimated to be scheduled for 06 Oct 22 18:05 UTC

post.description: This endpoint allows user to remove licenses from a list of devices.

deviceList.resultReason: Upgrade pending, the device upgrade is estimated to be scheduled for 06 Oct 22 18:05 UTC

post.description: This endpoint allows a user to schedule a firmware upgrade for a list of devices.

put.summary: Add or Remove devices to an existing firmware campaign. This api is allowed before the campaign StartDate
put.description: This endpoint allows user to Add or Remove devices to an existing campaign.

requestBody.description: Add or remove device to existing upgrade information.

200.description: Returns add or remove devices to existing upgrade information.

put.summary: Change firmware campaign dates and time windows. This api is allowed before the campaign StartDate
put.description: This endpoint allows user to change campaign dates and time windows. Fields which need to remain unchanged should be also provided.

get.description: This endpoint allows the user to retrieve campaign level information for a specified campaign.

delete.summary: Cancel a previously scheduled firmware campaign. This api is allowed before the campaign StartDate
delete.description: This endpoint allows user to cancel a firmware campaign. A firmware campaign already started can not be cancelled.

get.description: Retrieve a list of campaigns for an account that have a specified campaign status.
Retrieve campaign history for a specific device.

200.description: Returns a list of firmware upgrades.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all devices in a campaign and the status of each device.

200.description: Returns an array of campaign history.

deviceList.resultReason: Upgrade pending, the device upgrade is estimated to be scheduled for 06 Oct 22 18:05 UTC

get.summary: Get a list of available firmware
get.description: This endpoint allows user to list the firmware of an account.

parameters.name: protocol
parameters.description: Filter to retrieve a specific protocol type used.

200.description: Returns an array of firmware objects.

put.description: Synchronize ThingSpace with the FOTA server for up to 100 devices.

requestBody.description: DeviceIds to get firmware info synchronously.

put.description: Ask a device to report its firmware version asynchronously.

get.description: Retrieve account device information such as reported firmware on the devices.

parameters.name: protocol
parameters.description: Filter to retrieve a specific protocol type used.

post.summary: Get account device information for a list of devices
post.description: Retrieve device information for a list of devices on an account.

get.description: This endpoint allows user to get the registered callback information.

put.description: This endpoint allows the user to update the HTTPS callback address.

post.description: This endpoint allows the user to create the HTTPS callback address.

delete.description: This endpoint allows user to delete a previously registered callback URL.

CampaignMetaInfoProtocol.description: Firmware protocol. Valid values include: LWM2M, OMD-DM.

DevicesProtocol.description: Firmware protocol. Valid values include: LWM2M, OMADM, HTTP.

FirmwareProtocol.description: Firmware protocol. Valid values include: LWM2M, OMD-DM, all.

V3AddOrRemoveDeviceRequest.description: Devices to add or remove from existing software upgrade information.

V3AddOrRemoveDeviceResult.description: Add or remove devices to existing upgrade information.

campaignTimeWindowList.description: List of allowed campaign time windows.

startTime.description: Start hour in range [0..23], current hour >= startTime.

endTime.description: End hour in range [1..24], current hour < endTime.

FotaV3Subscription.description: Information for licenses applied to devices.

purchaseType.description: Subscription models used by the account.

licenseCount.description: Number of monthly licenses in an MRC subscription.

licenseUsedCount.description: Number of licenses currently assigned to devices.

updateTime.description: The date and time of when the subscription was last updated.

V3LicenseSummary.description: Information for FOTA licenses assigned to devices.

hasMoreData.description: True if there are more devices to retrieve.

protocol.description: Valid values include: LWM2M, OMA and HTTP.

campaignTimeWindowList.description: List of allowed campaign time windows.

autoAssignLicenseFlag.description: This flag, when set to true, will assign a FOTA license automatically if the device does not have one already.

autoAddDevicesFlag.description: this flag, when set to true, will automatically add a device of the same make and model to a campaign.

firmwareFrom.description: Old firmware version (for firmware upgrade only).

firmwareTo.description: New firmware version (for firmware upgrade only).

campaignTimeWindowList.description: List of allowed campaign time windows.

FirmwareIMEI.description: A list of IMEIs for devices to be synchronized between ThingSpace and the FOTA server.

campaignTimeWindowList.description: List of allowed campaign time windows.

deviceList.description: List of devices with id in IMEI.

resultReason.example: Upgrade pending, the device upgrade is estimated to be scheduled for 06 Oct 22 18:05 UTC

fotaEligible.description: Value=true if the device software can be upgraded over the air using the Software Management Services API.

protocol.description: Firmware protocol. Valid values include: LWM2M, OMADM, HTTP or NONE.

createTime.description: The date and time of when the device is created.

statusTime.description: The date and time of when the device firmware or software is updated.

updateTime.description: The date and time of when the device is updated.

refreshTime.description: The date and time of when the device is refreshed.

lastConnectionTime.description: The date and time of when the device reachability is checked.

protocol.description: The protocol of the firmware distribution. Default: LWM2M.

campaignTimeWindowList.description: List of allowed campaign time windows.

autoAssignLicenseFlag.description: Any device included in the device list which does not have a license will automatically be assigned a FOTA license, assuming there are enough FOTA licenses available, when set to true.

autoAddDevicesFlag.description: Beyond the devices included on the device list, any other device(s) which matches the eligibility criteria (same make, model, current firmware, protocol, billing account) will automatically be added to the campaign list during the life of the campaign when set to true.

FotaV3CallbackRegistrationRequest.description: Callback URL where the listening service is running.

url.description: Callback URL for an subscribed service.
Callback URL for an subscribed service.
